name: claudebuddy
description: ClaudeBuddy - Your friendly companion dashboard for Claude Code with Supervisor Agent

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3456
scripts.dev: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3456
scripts.server: cd server && source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --port 3456
scripts.setup:python: cd server && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.electron:dev-live: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "sleep 3 && VITE_DEV_SERVER=true electron ."
